name: Brass Willow
tagline: We shorten your Time to Success
description:
Brass Willow is an agile consulting company working with organizations developing their own software. But not with all of them. We work with professionals tired of dummy successes who want more for their business, and with people who know that there’s a better way to make successful products. We uncover hidden power within organization and give you the courage to act. We tailor bespoke solutions for your particular problems.
We don’t follow gut feelings or opinions, but use extensive first-hand experience and evidence based management to make educated decisions instead of guessing. Our mission is clear: we help those who treat agility as a weapon in the rapidly changing market. We shorten your time to success
READ MORE...
